name: Ohio Valley Banc Corp.
description: Ohio Valley Banc Corp. is a financial holding company that provides a full range of banking and financial services to individuals and businesses primarily within the Appalachian region. Founded in 1872, the company operates through its wholly-owned subsidiaries, including The Ohio Valley Bank Company and Loan Central. Ohio Valley Banc Corp. is committed to offering personalized banking solutions, including checking and savings accounts, loans, mortgages, and investment services. The company emphasizes community involvement and strives to maintain strong relationships with its customers, delivering tailored financial products that meet their specific needs. With a focus on growth and stability, Ohio Valley Banc Corp. aims to enhance the financial well-being of its clients while adhering to high standards of integrity and service. The company is dedicated to leveraging modern banking technologies to improve customer experience while preserving the traditional values of community banking. Ohio Valley Banc Corp. continues to adapt to the evolving financial landscape, ensuring that it remains a trusted partner for financial solutions in the communities it serves.

seo.meta_title: Ohio Valley Banc Corp. | Community Banking and Financial Services
seo.meta_description: Explore Ohio Valley Banc Corp., your community partner for banking and financial services in the Appalachian region. Discover our personalized solutions for individuals and businesses.

faq.question: What services does Ohio Valley Banc Corp. offer?
faq.answer: Ohio Valley Banc Corp. offers a range of banking services including personal and business banking, loans, mortgages, and investment services.

faq.question: Where is Ohio Valley Banc Corp. headquartered?
faq.answer: Ohio Valley Banc Corp. is headquartered in Gallipolis, Ohio, USA.

faq.question: When was Ohio Valley Banc Corp. founded?
faq.answer: Ohio Valley Banc Corp. was founded in 1872.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Ohio Valley Banc Corp.?
faq.answer: The CEO of Ohio Valley Banc Corp. is T. Edward W. A. McCoy.
